typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as timestamp,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(UserID != 'Null' && toString({VisitDateTime})>= toString('2018-05-07') && toString({VisitDateTime})<toString('2018-05-28')) ~> Filterdata
Filterdata derive(ProductID = "Product101",
		Activity = lower(Activity)) ~> Derivedproductid
Derivedproductid sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> sink1
